Package user.organizer

Class OrganizerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • user.UserController
      • user.attendee.AttendeeController
        • user.organizer.OrganizerController
  • public class OrganizerController
extends AttendeeController
    Refers to the controller class that will deal with the actions of an organizer object.

      • createBlastMessage

        void createBlastMessage​(java.lang.String blastType,
                        java.lang.String message)
        This method sends messages to all people of a specific type
        Parameters:
        blastType - This is the type of the individual. Choices are "speaker", "organizer" and "attendee"
        message - This is the actual message
